Text: yes, i like this game but i  wont buy it. it's crippled-none of the challenge modes work. got a copy off the net years ago with the same issue. oh well, time to dust off my os9 (legit) copy. thanks anyway for the up

Unless you're running Tiger, most of the Postal games for Mac that run natively work like crap. They use out-dated universal binaries and you're better off getting the windows version and playing it with wine.
You can get Windows version here: https://thepiratebay.se/torrent/7108255
